===============

# Notice of Proposed Procurement: Shipping and Storage Containers

## Solicitation Number: W8485-258536/A
## Publication Date: 2024-11-22

The Department of National Defence seeks to procure shipping and storage containers, as detailed below.

### Contract Overview

* **Contracting Entity:** DGAEPM

We regret to inform that due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, the bid receiving unit is operating under reduced business hours and limited staff availability. As a result, bidders are strongly encouraged to submit their proposals electronically using the epost Connect service.

### Request for Proposal (RFP) Description

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for shipping and storage containers. The following specifications apply:

*   **Item 1:** Shipping and Storage Containers
*   **Quantity:** 60 units
*   **Unit of Issue:** EA (Each)
*   **Delivery Location:** 25 CFSD Montreal
*   **Delivery Date:** Before March 2025

### Important Details

*   Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or Part Number, and the NCAGE they are offering.
*   The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Documents and Submission

The solicitation documents can be found at the link below. Proposals can be submitted in either English or French.

[Attachment: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52528/w8485-258536a-conteneurs-de-stockage-dexpedition-ddp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52528/w8485-258536a-conteneurs-de-stockage-dexpedition-ddp.pdf)
